Method Detail

addMemberToReplicaSet

public boolean addMemberToReplicaSet(MongoDBServer secondary, java.lang.Integer id)
Reconfigures the replica set that the server the method is invoked on is the primary member of to include a new member.

Note that this can cause long downtime (typically 10-20s, even up to a minute).

Parameters:
secondary - New member of the set.
id - The id for the new set member. Must be unique within the set; its validity is not checked.
Returns:
True if addition is successful. False if the server this is called on is not the primary member of the replica set.

getReplicaSet

public MongoDBReplicaSet getReplicaSet()
Returns:
The replica set the server belongs to, or null if the server is a standalone instance.

initializeReplicaSet

public boolean initializeReplicaSet(java.lang.String replicaSetName, java.lang.Integer id)
Initialises a replica set at the server the method is invoked on.
Parameters:
replicaSetName - The name for the replica set.
id - The id to be given to this server in the replica set configuration.
Returns:
True if initialisation is successful.

isReplicaSetMember

public boolean isReplicaSetMember()
Returns:
True if the server is a child of MongoDBReplicaSet.

removeMemberFromReplicaSet

public boolean removeMemberFromReplicaSet(MongoDBServer server)
Reconfigures the replica set that the server the method is invoked on is the primary member of to remove the given server.
Parameters:
server - The server to remove.
Returns:
True if removal is successful. False if the server this is called on is not the primary member of the replica set.
